comfortable communicating with a wide variety of people

positive attitude
ability to be flexible and adapt quickly to changing circumstances
strong level of competency and attention to detail
availability to assist the Member outside of regular business hours
A Bachelor’s degree is required and 1-3 years of prior scheduling experience desired
salary: commensurate with the candidate’s level of experience with a wide range of benefits
